<form onsubmit="event.preventDefault(); checkAnswer('module2_mcq_q12')" data-correct-answer="C">
<strong style="display: block;">A stock has β=1.2, Rf=3%, Rm=9%. What is its expected return under CAPM?</strong>

<label><input type="radio" name="module2_mcq_q12" value="B"> B. 10%</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module2_mcq_q12" value="C"> C. 10.2%</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module2_mcq_q12" value="D"> D. 11%</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module2_mcq_q12" value="E"> E. 12%</label><br>
</form>
<div id="feedback-module2_mcq_q12" class="feedback" data-status="" style="display:none;">
✅ Correct: C. E(R)=3%+1.2×(9−3)%=10.2%.
